name: The Battle of Bigtown
description:
The Battle of Bigtown is a game where you start a party by hiring people over the world and increasing your money by winning fights with bandits (or by raiding innocent settlements). Use this money to hire more people and keep your party fed.

The battle work by command your units in what they should do (defend or attack), while you're a sole commander who can't fight yourself.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Z confirm
  • X cancel/open command menu

This is the first attempt of doing the "Game a Week", it was created from a monday to friday in livestreams, the source of this is open at Github
